title: CCTV & Surveillance
paragraph: At Quadra Security, we specialize in delivering state-of-the-art CCTV and surveillance solutions designed to protect what matters most. Our systems combine advanced high-definition cameras, intelligent video analytics, and remote monitoring capabilities to ensure complete visibility and control over your premises—whether residential, commercial, or industrial.

faqs.question: 1. How does Quadra Security’s CCTV solution operate?
faqs.answer: Our CCTV systems integrate HD/IP cameras, NVRs, and cloud connectivity to provide real-time monitoring and smart analytics. Footage can be accessed remotely via secure mobile or desktop dashboards for complete situational awareness

faqs.question: 2. What makes your CCTV setup more reliable than regular systems?
faqs.answer: We deploy advanced AI-enabled cameras with motion detection, night vision, and intrusion alerts — ensuring 24×7 protection and data integrity even during power or network fluctuations.

faqs.question: 3. Can CCTV be integrated with other security systems?
faqs.answer: Yes. We specialize in integrating CCTV with access control, alarm systems, and ANPR cameras for unified security management and event-based automation.

title: Biometric Systems
paragraph: We provide advanced biometric access control solutions that ensure seamless and secure identity management. from consultation and site assessment to installation, integration, and maintenance. Our team delivers high-precision fingerprint, facial, and iris recognition systems that enhance access control, attendance management, and overall security efficiency. We specialize in deploying customized biometric setups for offices, industries, institutions, and housing societies, ensuring seamless integration with existing infrastructure. With end-to-end service support, regular health checks, and expert guidance, we make biometric access simple, reliable, and future-ready for every client.

faqs.question: 1. What biometric technologies do you deploy?
faqs.answer: We provide cutting-edge fingerprint, face, palm, and iris recognition systems with anti-spoofing algorithms for secure and frictionless access.

faqs.question: 2. How do biometric systems enhance operational efficiency?
faqs.answer: Our systems automate attendance tracking, eliminate proxy access, and generate instant reports — improving workforce accountability and administrative accuracy.

faqs.question: 3. Can they be managed centrally across multiple locations?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. Our cloud-based control panel enables centralized user management, remote configuration, and live monitoring across all branches.

title: ANPR
paragraph: Quadra Security provides end-to-end Automatic Number Plate Recognition (ANPR) camera solutions designed to enhance traffic management and access control. Our services include system design, installation, configuration, and maintenance of advanced ANPR cameras capable of capturing and recognizing vehicle plates with high accuracy — even in low-light or high-speed conditions. We integrate ANPR systems with boom barriers, parking management software, and security databases to automate entry and exit operations. From toll plazas and gated communities to corporate campuses and logistics hubs, we deliver fully customized ANPR solutions that improve efficiency, ensure compliance, and strengthen on-site security.

faqs.question: 1. How accurate are your ANPR systems in real-world conditions?
faqs.answer: Our ANPR cameras use AI-powered OCR algorithms to capture number plates in diverse lighting and speed conditions with over 95% accuracy.

faqs.question: 2. Can ANPR data be used for automation and record-keeping?
faqs.answer: Yes. The data seamlessly integrates with toll, parking, and gate management systems for automated entry, billing, and audit trails.

faqs.question: 3. Do you provide customized ANPR deployments?
faqs.answer: Yes. From standalone gates to highway-scale networks, we design ANPR systems customized for vehicle type, lane width, and throughput volume.

title: EPABX Systems
paragraph: We deliver comprehensive EPABX (Electronic Private Automatic Branch Exchange) system solutions that streamline internal and external communication for organizations of all sizes. Our services cover consultation, system design, installation, configuration, and ongoing maintenance to ensure seamless connectivity across departments.

faqs.question: 1. What makes your EPABX solutions efficient for modern businesses?
faqs.answer: We deliver hybrid EPABX systems that support both analog and VoIP networks, ensuring smooth internal communication and scalability for growing teams.

faqs.question: 2. Can the system integrate with CRM or intercom networks?
faqs.answer: Yes. Our EPABX setups can be integrated with CRMs, intercoms, and call analytics software to streamline customer engagement and operations.

faqs.question: 3. Do you offer remote maintenance or upgrades?
faqs.answer: Yes, modern CCTV systems are simple to install and can be monitored remotely.

title: Interactive Display Panels
paragraph: Quadra Security offers complete Interactive Display Panel solutions designed to transform communication, collaboration, and learning experiences. Our services include consultation, installation, integration, and post-installation support for a wide range of smart touch-enabled panels. Ideal for classrooms, conference rooms, and command centers.

faqs.question: 1. Do you handle integration with AV and conferencing systems?
faqs.answer: Yes. We integrate display panels with microphones, cameras, and conferencing tools like Zoom, Teams, and Google Meet for a unified setup.

faqs.question: 2. Can you customize installations for different environments?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. We provide tailored mounting, cabling, and calibration solutions to suit classrooms, boardrooms, and control centers.

faqs.question: 3. Do you provide complete installation and support services?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. Quadra Security provides end-to-end services including delivery, installation, configuration, and after-sales maintenance to ensure smooth operation and long-term reliability.

title: Video Door Phones
paragraph: We provides professional Video Door Phone (VDP) solutions that combine convenience, safety, and modern design for residential and commercial spaces. Our services include product selection, installation, configuration, and integration with existing access control or surveillance systems. From single-door units to multi-apartment setups, we deliver customized VDP solutions.

faqs.question: 1. What advanced features do your Video Door Phones offer?
faqs.answer: Our VDPs support two-way video calling, remote unlocking, visitor snapshots, and app-based control via Wi-Fi or 4G connectivity.

faqs.question: 2. Can they integrate with access control and CCTV?
faqs.answer: Yes. We create unified entry systems where your VDP, door lock, and CCTV work together for intelligent visitor management.

faqs.question: 3. Are they suitable for multi-apartment and commercial setups?
faqs.answer: Definitely. We design scalable IP-based VDP systems for high-rise buildings, gated communities, and office premises.

title: Baggage Scanners
paragraph: Quadra Security provides comprehensive Baggage Scanning System solutions to ensure secure and efficient screening of luggage, parcels, and goods. Our services include system supply, installation, calibration, operator training, and preventive maintenance to guarantee optimal performance. Equipped with advanced X-ray imaging and threat detection technology.

faqs.question: 1. What technology ensures high detection accuracy in your scanners?
faqs.answer: Our scanners use dual-energy X-ray technology to identify metallic, organic, and mixed materials with clear color-coded imaging.

faqs.question: 2. Do your systems comply with global security standards?
faqs.answer: Yes. All baggage scanners comply with BIS and international aviation safety standards for threat detection and operator safety.

faqs.question: 3. Do you provide operational training and AMC support?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. We provide certified operator training, preventive maintenance, and rapid-response AMC services.

title: Alarm Systems
paragraph: Quadra Security provides complete Alarm System solutions that offer instant detection and response against fire, intrusion, and emergencies. Our services include system design, installation, integration, and maintenance of advanced wired and wireless alarm systems equipped with motion, smoke, gas, and vibration sensors. We tailor every setup to meet the unique needs of homes.

faqs.question: 1. What types of alarm systems do you offer?
faqs.answer: We install smart intrusion, panic, and fire alarm systems that detect abnormal activity and trigger instant local and remote alerts.

faqs.question: 2. How do your alarm systems communicate during emergencies?
faqs.answer: Our alarms support GSM, Wi-Fi, and IP communication, sending real-time alerts to users and security centers.

faqs.question: 3. Can alarm systems integrate with CCTV or access control?
faqs.answer: Yes. We enable intelligent linkage where alarms trigger automated camera recording or access lockdown.

title: Metal Detectors
paragraph: Quadra Security offers reliable Metal Detection System services designed to enhance safety and security at entry and exit points. We provide complete solutions, including supply, installation, calibration, and maintenance of both hand-held and walk-through metal detectors. Our systems are engineered for high sensitivity, fast detection, and durability.

faqs.question: 1. What range of metal detectors do you supply and service?
faqs.answer: We offer high-sensitivity walk-through and hand-held detectors that can differentiate between ferrous and non-ferrous metals.

faqs.question: 2. How do you ensure accuracy and reliability?
faqs.answer: Our devices undergo regular calibration and are designed with multi-zone detection and adjustable sensitivity for precision screening.

faqs.question: 3. Can they be integrated with alarm or access control systems?
faqs.answer: Yes. They can trigger alarms or access restrictions when linked with your existing security network.

title: Boom Barriers & Toll Solutions
paragraph: We deliver comprehensive Boom Barrier and Toll Management Solutions designed for efficient vehicle control and automated access. Our services include supply, installation, integration, and maintenance of heavy-duty automatic boom barriers, toll collection systems, and RFID-based entry setups. Whether for  industrial complexes, corporate campuses. or highway tolls.

faqs.question: 1. What differentiates your boom barrier systems?
faqs.answer: We use industrial-grade motors with fast response times and weather-resistant designs for 24×7 operation in high-traffic areas.

faqs.question: 2. Can your barriers be automated or IoT-enabled?
faqs.answer: Yes. Our solutions support RFID, ANPR, and IoT-based remote control for smart and contactless access management.

faqs.question: 3. Do you provide toll integration and monitoring?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. We implement integrated toll management software for seamless entry recording, billing, and reporting.

title: Electronic Door Locks
paragraph: Quadra Security offers advanced Electronic Door Lock solutions that combine convenience, security, and smart control for residential, commercial, and industrial applications. Our services include expert consultation, installation, integration, and maintenance of digital locks powered by PIN, RFID, f ingerprint, or mobile app access. We specialize in providing keyless entry systems.

faqs.question: 1. What security features do your smart locks include?
faqs.answer: Our digital locks feature PIN, RFID, fingerprint, and mobile app access, with tamper alarms and auto lock functionality.

faqs.question: 2. Can they be connected to smart home or office automation?
faqs.answer: Yes. We integrate locks with IoT and smart automation systems for remote monitoring and control.

faqs.question: 3. What after-sales support do you provide?
faqs.answer: We offer installation, warranty, software updates, and prompt on-site assistance to ensure long-term reliability.

title: Access Control Systems
paragraph: We offer end-to-end Access Control System solutions designed to manage and monitor entry across secure zones efficiently. Our services cover system design, installation, configuration, and integration with biometric, RFID, and smart card technologies. We provide customized setups for offices, industries, educational institutions, and residential complexes.

faqs.question: 1. How do your access control systems strengthen security?
faqs.answer: We deploy RFID, biometric, and facial access systems that log every entry and exit, ensuring traceability and eliminating unauthorized access.

faqs.question: 2. Can your systems handle multi-location access networks?
faqs.answer: Yes. Our centralized management software allows real-time control and reporting across multiple sites or branches.

faqs.question: 3. Are they compatible with time attendance or HR systems?
faqs.answer: Completely. We integrate access data with ERP, payroll, and HR software for unified workforce management.
